main.name: Jeremy Jakobsons
main.description: I'm an Agile Coach by day, and a Full Stack web dev in training by night. Welcome to my page, glad you are here! Take a look around and get in touch if you would like to work together!
main.bio: Throughout my working years, I have always had a strong interest/passion for technology. As an Agile Coach I have been able to help elevate development teams processes and collaboration with other teams/leadership! I am now headed over to the other side of this, and want to help people by creating/improving the tools/resources/software we all use on a daily basis.
main.contactmessage: Like what you see? Want to work together on a project, or work for your organization? Get it touch with me below!
